entity.name: Senate
entity.entry:
The Senate oversees the civil matters in the lands, passing laws that the Praetor enforces with his [organisation:6801108|Guard]. It is intended to balance the power of the Praetor which, as it turns out, causes some interesting family dynamics for the [family:6801167] (pronounced - Glaba) family whose first born is the Praetor ([character:6801107|Marcus Antonius]) and first daughter is Senator [character:6801072], a first among equals. 

Because it is all but impossible to balance the Praetor without military might, the Senate maintains a strong relationship with the [organisation:6801151], the [organisation:6801141|Trades] and also any adventuring groups based out of the great city state of [location:6800997].

Advancing these ranks of [ability:6801106|renown] has it's privileges and looks like this: 

  • Peregrini - Freeborn of the conquered lands. Typically having Gaelic names
  • Plebian - Citizens, farmers and shopkeepers
  • Patrician - Citizens of the upper class, live inside the walls
  • Equestrian - Wealthier, this citizen generally has horses, gladiators, etc.
  • Senator - Full members of the Senate who debate and order civil matters.

There are also slaves who have very few legal protections, but once freed, they attain the rank of Freemen which is equivalent to the Peregrini, but still maintains a stigma.
